org.magicdgs.readtools.utils

Class HadoopUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.magicdgs.readtools.utils.HadoopUtils

  • public final class HadoopUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Hadoop utilities.

    The purpose of this utilities is to avoid the usage of org.apache.hadoop imports in other classes not related directly with hadoop.

    For example, if the jar file does not include the Hadoop library, it should still work for Path that are not HadoopPath.

    • Method Detail

      • getOutputStream

        public static java.io.OutputStream getOutputStream(hdfs.jsr203.HadoopPath path,
                                                   boolean overwrite,
                                                   int bufferSize,
                                                   java.lang.Short replication,
                                                   java.lang.Long blockSize)
                                            throws java.io.IOException
        Gets an output stream from an HDFS file.

        Note: teh replication use the default set on the path.

        Parameters:
        path - path in HDFS.
        overwrite - if true, it will overwrite if the path already exists.
        bufferSize - buffer-size for the output stream.
        replication - replication for the HDFS output; if null, use default.
        blockSize - block-size for the HDFS output; if null, use default.
        Returns:
        an output stream (maybe buffered)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • maybeCompressedOutputStream

        public static java.io.OutputStream maybeCompressedOutputStream(hdfs.jsr203.HadoopPath path,
                                                               java.io.OutputStream outputStream)
                                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Compress the output stream derived from an HDFS file.

        This method uses the compression-codec factory from the Hadoop library and thus support any compression present in the service file.

        Parameters:
        path - path in HDFS.
        outputStream - output stream to wrap.
        Returns:
        the output stream (maybe wrapped)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
